spiritsExplanation:
The primary workout spirit of this video is 'High-Energy & Intense' with a strong match score of 0.9. This is supported by the description and user comments emphasizing 'high intensity spinning', 'heart rate pumping', and 'fat burning', which are tell-tale indicators of a high-energy workout. The intervals of high intensity mentioned suggest a vigorous, challenging routine typical of high-energy workouts.

'Flow & Rhythm' follows with a score of 0.6, as there are elements of continuous movement and coordination involved in cycling workouts. The comments highlighting enjoyment of the music in the background reinforce this spirit, as the rhythm is essential to cycling classes.

'Structured & Disciplined' has a moderate match score of 0.5 due to the routine involving intervals with specific intensity and resistance adjustments, suggesting a structured approach to training.

Other spirits like 'Soothing & Restorative', 'Sport & Agility', and 'Outdoor & Adventure' are excluded because the focus is on high intensity, indoor settings, and not on recovery, sports-specific skills, or outdoor exploration.
